articles.title: Dividend Payouts Are Latest Sign of Big Tech's Financial Muscle - Bloomberg
articles.description: After years of chasing growth at all costs, tech firms are taking a page from the playbook of old-school value businesses — paying a dividend. Throwing off more cash than they can spend, the shift to a regular payout provides more evidence for the companies’ …

articles.title: How iPadOS Is Dragging The OLED iPad Pro Down To The Level Of The Budget iPads - Wccftech
articles.description: New OLED iPad Pro models are great, but iPadOS is holding back its potential to become a full-fledged computer and Apple needs to take note.
articles.content: Apple's new OLED iPad Pro is the company's thinnest device yet, beating the iPod nano. With the latest upgrades, the company could retain the numbers that it lost last year. However, demand for the O… [+2535 chars]
